price: Enti εberε a ohunu sε awia apue hyεnhyεnhyεn no, ͻkaa sε: ‘’Woi ne me wura, woi na εsoo’.’ Ɛberε a awia no kͻtͻeε no, ͻkaa sε: “Menkorͻfoͻ, nokorε sε m’atwe me ho afri deε mode bata (Nyankopͻn) ho (som no no) ho“.
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلشَّمۡسَ بَازِغَةٗ قَالَ هَٰذَا رَبِّي هَٰذَآ أَكۡبَرُۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَتۡ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā raā al-shamsa bāzighatan qāla hādhā rabbī hādhā akbaru falammā afalat qāla yāqawmi innī barīon mimmā tush'rikūna
